subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Claude Lemieux, 43, is back in the N.H.L. after a five-and-a-half-year absence, joining the San Jose Sharks. The N.H.L.-leading Sharks recalled Lemieux from their minor league affiliate in Worcester, Mass. Lemieux is likely to play Tuesday night against Vancouver in the Sharks’ final game before the All-Star break.
